articles.title: LIC IPO may be split into two offerings: Report - Moneycontrol
articles.description: From January-July, more than Rs 50,000 crore raised via IPOs. Experts told Moneycontrol that about 18 companies could raise about Rs 28,000 crore through their IPOs in August.
articles.content:
In a first, state-owned Life Insurance Corp (LIC) may split its initial public offering (IPO) into two parts with a gap of a few months.
